[{"broader_impact_description": "The GeoChronR project developed a framework for quantifying and visualizing uncertainties in paleogeoscientific data, and created a user-friendly set of uncertainty quantification tools for paleogeoscientists.", "principal_beneficiaries": "Paleogeoscientists, explicitly mentioned.", "reasoning": "The primary beneficiaries are paleogeoscientists who are considered an advantaged group.", "inclusion_code": "advantaged", "immediacy_code": "intrinsic"}, {"broader_impact_description": "The project developed the Linked PaleoData (LiPD) framework, a flexible and extensible data model and format for broad use across the paleogeosciences.", "principal_beneficiaries": "Paleogeoscientists, explicitly mentioned.", "reasoning": "The primary beneficiaries are paleogeoscientists who are considered an advantaged group.", "inclusion_code": "advantaged", "immediacy_code": "intrinsic"}, {"broader_impact_description": "The project hosted two training workshops for early career researchers at Northern Arizona University, training a diverse array of scientists on how to use LiPD and GeoChronR.", "principal_beneficiaries": "Early career researchers, explicitly mentioned.", "reasoning": "The primary beneficiaries are early career researchers who are considered an advantaged group.", "inclusion_code": "advantaged", "immediacy_code": "extrinsic"}, {"broader_impact_description": "The end goal is to radically simplify the quantification of past events of environmental consequence, so we can make more informed decisions about how to be better stewards of our planet and the life it supports.", "principal_beneficiaries": "Society at large, inferred.", "reasoning": "The broader impact aims to benefit society by improving environmental stewardship, which is a universal benefit.", "inclusion_code": "universal", "immediacy_code": "intrinsic"}]
